Sing your own special song <3

Good morning. I'm alive!

1525303454_1Dy3DRM8GHWFbNg3JmBmGX1GNGyCP.body: Of course, Jesus can't look like Jesus. That's not the point. Nobody will listen to some hippie with a beard. It could be a man, woman.. anybody.

1525258130_18NrbxMytZcJcDcsUadLeSAfZ2f49.body: No more debates .. we'll have to find one good system if we want this species to survive. The incessant arguing will result in the death of mankind. Stephen Hawking is dead.. all our heroes are dead. It's time for a second coming.

> [blip](#comment_4_1CXjx6VwJrifbou46CFAGEpic4v7oaqPm9): I used to think it was good too, then I realized that it's just a man complaining while offering almost nothing in terms of solutions. If he did have REAL solutions, he would have presented them clearly in every single video. What did he actually create? Pretty architecture? [...]

Then offer a better solution.

> [theanswerer0](#comment_12_1F2ZbgkHvpknveTB6wFa5xNEQBb8yxQnCR): Stephan Hawking was your hero...? You'd better hope black holes are real and not just a giant question mark imposed on us by the math due to us having an incomplete understanding of physics. Otherwise I'm not sure exactly what his life's work will have amounted to in the grand scheme of things. [...]

All life.

1525313920_1Dy3DRM8GHWFbNg3JmBmGX1GNGyCP.body: Jordan peterson. Jump on noahs ark. We'll save life on Earth. Enough with the horeshit
Seems like the world had a break down. Big Bang. Exponentially accelerating complexity and bullshit

1525488037_1EHjrNgbVBWHQ7BiKwqKD6pSbowep.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_608_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): This is not at all what quantum immortality is. Nor is this likely the answer to death. [...]

That I know, of course. Then again - there's different kinds of Singularities. Humans are just as capable of achieving singularity as robots are .. by being the sculptors of their own statues.

When talking about quantum immortality in terms of *subjective* experience, I'll let this video do the explaining. This is what I personally witessed in the psych ward. Not saying that I'm a know-it-all or that I know what happens after you die.. but .. yeah, it's some food for thought:
https://youtu.be/cDatTy9BU2A

1525902420_1Dy3DRM8GHWFbNg3JmBmGX1GNGyCP.body: I guess they can't give me sleeping pills forever. I'm gonna need a Mana booster.
Wait. What was I doing again?
I'm gonna have to train an AI agent that boosts my motivation. Text-to-speech. Reward the agent based on how motivated it keeps you.

> [pq9p](#comment_5_141t775YRGcErzqqn4dwUyUQqZrjhdnN3n): No, multitasking is not ok for humans...Advice: Try to read some time each day. I usually try to read 2 or 3h a day. This helps me to gain focus on whatever I want. Read in the morning and work in the afternoon for example.Hope I helped you  :)

Any help is ok. Preach :)

1525110299_1LAitKPQa2dNhNPTt2NKT2F4DuHWV.body: I'll see you on the 5th of November. :)

1525987671_1Dy3DRM8GHWFbNg3JmBmGX1GNGyCP.body: If you hurt my cat, you will be Damned.

1526051818_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkA.body:
> [chikan](#comment_17_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB): Why there is so much hostility towards pedophiles? We aren't necessarily rapist (yes, a lot of us are, but isn't a rule), often we just like a specific genre of porn.

As long as you stick to the anime type ...
This could be a bait, by the way. If i were a pedophile, I'd run from that site ... and just take castration pills. Luckily, I'm not. I like women.. slightly older than me.
The act of pedophilia is morally wrong. But, if you choose not to act on it, you can still live a normal life. The answer lies in Anime.

> [shitchell](#comment_62_1LybGoL99LBuYE8ZtwgJC8dxkii3UmYKpo): Pedophilia isn't an act. It's not a verb. It's a noun. An orientation. How is a sexual orientation morally wrong?

The sexual orientation of pedophilia is not morally wrong. It's the act that is morally wrong

1526116721_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5.body: Privacy is an illusion. We don't live in the age of privacy anymore - we live in a new age of Honour
